pageProduct.name: Thompson's Ultra B12 1000mcg 100 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thompson's Ultra B12 1000mcg support red blood cell health and general wellbeing

Thompson's Ultra B12 is a sublingual formulation for maximum convenience to assist healthy red blood cell production.

Size: 100tabs

Oil-Free?: Yes

Shelf Life in Days: 1095

KEY FEATURES

• Assist healthy red blood cell production
• Helps prevent dietary vitamin B12 deficiency and increase vitamin B12 ....levels in the body especially useful for vegans, vegetarians & the elderly
• Helps decrease homocysteine levels
• Support nerve conduction
• Vegetarian friendly
• Supports Vitamin B12 levels in the body within normal range
• Convenient format

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional. Vitamins supplements should not replace a balanced diet.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Each tablet contains:
Cyanocobalamin (Vitamin B12) 1mg

Directions

Store below 30°C in a dry place. Do not use if bottle and/or cap seal is missing or broken. Keep out of reach of children.

Storage Temperature: below 30°C

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
